sections.title: References

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: This section includes gene names that need to adhere to HUGO Gene Nomenclature standards.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: Gene 'anln' appears in lowercase instead of the expected italicized format.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Partial adherence as gene names are present but not formatted correctly.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Gene abbreviations are relevant for clarity and efficiency in citation references.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: Abbreviations used consistently but with minor formatting issues.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Strong adherence; formatting can be improved.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Relevant to ensure proper capitalization of gene names in citations.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The gene name 'ANLN' is not consistently capitalized.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Partial adherence; not all gene names follow the capitalized format.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Relevant for consistency within scientific references.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: Occasional lack of italicization for scientific names.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Partial adherence; not all scientific names are italicized as required.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: No overlaps encountered in this specific context.

sections.meta_notes: The section presents gene names and abbreviations but requires improvement in formatting and adherence to conventions.
